summary:
(Note: I forgot to rename her into "Fanabi." She is currently "Prisoner." Please rename her using 'showracemenu'!)

This mod adds a brand-new save game - a cute half-elf (original race Breton) girl!
descriptionHtml:
(Note: I forgot to rename her into "Fanabi." She is currently "Prisoner." Please rename her using 'showracemenu'!)This mod adds a brand-new save game - a cute half-elf (original race Breton) girl!

This is my first-ever mod. Well, save game. I tried pretty hard to make her as cute as possible, with a very little mod list. It adds a female save game, breton with elf ears, to the game. Whomp. It's from the beginning. If you want, I can give a later save game (I'm still playing it currently) but! It will require more mods.

Please add your own screenshots- mine always mess up due to terribad formatting, so I can't really upload any. Thanks!!

[b]
REQUIREMENTS:
[/b]XP32 MAXIMUM SKELETON
SkyUI
Racemenu
Nouserhere's Ears
Fair Skin Complexion
Mikan Eyes
Alternate Start Live Another Life
SG Females Renewal
KS Hairstyles
UNP Body

(NOTICE: IT WILL SAY THAT THE GAME DOESN'T HAVE CERTAIN THINGS - IT'S BECAUSE THIS SAVE FILE ALSO HAS OTHER MODS INSTALLED! I BELIEVE THIS WILL NOT EFFECT ANYTHING, DUE TO THE FACT I HAVE THE MAIN ONES USED TO CREATE FANABI AS REQUIREMENTS.)

Recommended Mods:
Kankaraya
Imperial Investigator Armor (+ DreamBurrow's retexture) (Use the white one. Fanabi looks best in it.)
Realistic Lighting Overhaul
Zoner's High Performance ENB
Rustic Dinnerware
All the "Pretty x Animations/Idles" EXCEPT combat idles
YYAnimReplacer Mystic Knight
Improved NPC Clothing
Osare Culort Armor
Female Facial Animation
Facelight
W.A.T.E.R
Enhanced Camera
Real Clouds


I do plan on, one day, releasing Fanabi as a STANDALONE companion! This may take a while, due to me using a tiny laptop, and me being a little bit of an idiot when it comes to modding. If anyone wants to help with it, please send me a message!! I'd like her to have custom voice acting, and maybe a quest behind her.

Please report any issues/bugs in the comments, and I hope you like her!!

Thank you to:
dimon99 for their beautiful body mod,
Kalilies and Stealthic Chaos for the lovely hair,
Hello Santa for the normal maps,
nouserhere for the elven ears,
SkyUI Team for the amazing new UI system,
xp32 for the new skeleton,
HHaleyy for the textures,
nerune for the eyes,
and Arthmoor for the welcome new starting mod.

Please contact me if you would like my full mod list!!
author: deadanimemom
